mapper.insert: INSERT INTO paper (owner_name, content, content_meta, image_url, user_id, board_id) VALUES (#{ownerName}, #{content}, #{contentMeta}, #{imageUrl}, #{userId}, #{boardId})
mapper.update: UPDATE paper SET id = #{id}, owner_name = #{ownerName}, content = #{content}, content_meta = #{contentMeta}, image_url = #{imageUrl}, created_date = #{createdDate}, updated_date = #{updatedDate}, user_id = #{userId}, board_id = #{boardId} WHERE id = #{paperId}
